title: Adaptive Memory Architecture (AMA) Schema
description: Schema for memory items and relationships in the Adaptive Memory Architecture system.

memory_items.description: List of individual memory items maintained by the system.

id.description: Unique identifier for the memory item.

content.description: Main textual content or information stored in this memory item.

semantic_embedding.description: Semantic embedding vector for the content.

metadata.description: Additional metadata associated with this memory item.

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the memory item was created or added.

source.description: Origin or source of the memory item (e.g., user input, external file).

language.description: Language of the content (e.g., 'en' for English).

confidence_score.description: Confidence score for the accuracy or relevance of this memory item.

relationships.description: List of relationships this memory item has with others.

related_to.description: ID of the memory item this relation links to.

memory_tiers.description: Definition of memory tiers within the system.

capacity.description: Maximum number of memory items this tier can hold.
